name: MDLPhysicallyPlausibleLight
desc: A light source for use in shading models based on real-world physics.

items.name: var color: CGColor?
items.desc: The color of the light source.

items.name: var lumens: Float
items.desc: The total visible intensity of the light source, in lumens.

items.name: func setColorByTemperature(Float)
items.desc: Sets the lightâ€™s color based on a black-body temperature.

items.name: var innerConeAngle: Float
items.desc: The radial angle, in degrees, of the area fully illuminated by the light.

items.name: var outerConeAngle: Float
items.desc: The radial angle, in degrees, at which the illumination from a spotlight becomes zero.

items.name: var attenuationStartDistance: Float
items.desc: The distance from the light source, in units of local coordinate space, at which its illumination begins to diminish.

items.name: var attenuationEndDistance: Float
items.desc: The distance from the light source, in units of local coordinate space, at which its illumination becomes zero.
